snippet: Three blasts struck mourners at a funeral in northern Iraq for a leader of the Sunni Awakening movement in Diyala Province.
abstract: Three blasts strike mourners at funeral in northern Iraq, killing at least 12 people and wounding 42.

byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Diyala Province, Iraq.

lead_paragraph: Three blasts struck mourners at a funeral in northern Iraq for a leader of the Sunni Awakening movement in Diyala Province.

headline.main: Blasts Kill at Least 12 Mourners at Funeral of Iraq Sunni Leader
headline.print_headline: Blasts Kill at Least 12 Mourners At Funeral of Iraq Sunni Leader
